snippet.title: OPUS: Echo of Starsong - Story Trailer (Summer 2021)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST & FOLLOW to get notified when the game launches 👉https://bit.ly/3BLISVE

"As long as we follow the lumen, we will find each other."
OPUS: Echo of Starsong is a narrative-driven mix between puzzle adventure and space exploration. 
Asteroids containing a mysterious substance known as "Lumen" have become the center of conflict for the immense power they hold. Eda, a girl who can sing the song of lumen, crosses paths with a young man seeking lumen of his own. Together, they venture out to unravel an ancient myth deep in the heart of space.

Coming in Summer 2021
Demo available for a limited time 👉https://bit.ly/3BLISVE
